fields.name: Morning Vinyasa Flow
fields.description: Start your day with an energizing vinyasa flow that synchronizes breath with movement. Perfect for building strength and flexibility while finding your inner calm.

fields.name: Power Strength Circuit
fields.description: High-intensity strength training circuit designed to build muscle and boost metabolism. Uses a combination of free weights and bodyweight exercises.

fields.name: Beginner Yoga Basics
fields.description: Learn the fundamentals of yoga in a welcoming, supportive environment. Focus on proper alignment, breathing techniques, and foundational poses.

fields.name: HIIT Burn
fields.description: Maximum calorie burn in minimum time! This high-intensity interval training class alternates between intense bursts of activity and short recovery periods.

fields.name: Spin & Burn
fields.description: Indoor cycling class with energizing music and motivating instructors. Suitable for all fitness levels with adjustable resistance.

fields.name: Core Pilates
fields.description: Strengthen your core and improve posture with this mat-based Pilates class. Focus on controlled movements and proper breathing.

fields.name: Functional Fitness
fields.description: Train movements, not muscles. This class focuses on exercises that help you perform daily activities more efficiently and safely.

fields.name: Evening Yoga Restore
fields.description: Wind down your day with gentle, restorative yoga poses. Focus on relaxation, stress relief, and deep stretching.

fields.name: Cardio Kickboxing
fields.description: Channel your inner fighter with this high-energy kickboxing class. Burn calories while learning basic boxing and martial arts techniques.

fields.name: Tabata Intensity
fields.description: Experience the ultimate 20-second work, 10-second rest interval training. Short but incredibly effective for building endurance and strength.

fields.name: Pilates Reformer
fields.description: Take your Pilates practice to the next level with specialized reformer equipment. Improve flexibility, strength, and body awareness.

fields.name: Beginner Strength Foundations
fields.description: New to strength training? Learn proper form and technique with basic exercises. Build confidence and a solid foundation for your fitness journey.
